00017 package WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::EquationDisplay;
00018 use base qw(WeBWorK::ContentGenerator);
00019 
00020 =head1 NAME
00021 
00022 
00023 WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::EquationDisplay -- create .png version of TeX equations.
00024 
00025 =cut
00026 
00027 use strict;
00028 use warnings;
00029 #use CGI qw(-nosticky );
00030 use WeBWorK::CGI;
00031 use WeBWorK::PG::ImageGenerator;
00032 
00033 sub display_equation {
00034     my ($self, $str) = @_;
00035     
00036     my $imageTag = $self->{image_gen}->add($str, 'inline');
00037     $self->{image_gen}->render();
00038     return $imageTag;
00039 }
00040 
00041 ################################################################################
00042 # template escape handlers
00043 ################################################################################
00044 
00045 sub initialize {
00046     my ($self) = @_;
00047     my $r = $self->r;
00048     my $ce = $r->ce;
00049     
00050     $self->{image_gen} = WeBWorK::PG::ImageGenerator->new(
00051         tempDir  => $ce->{webworkDirs}->{tmp}, # global temp dir
00052         latex    => $ce->{externalPrograms}->{latex},
00053         dvipng   => $ce->{externalPrograms}->{dvipng},
00054         useCache => 1,
00055         cacheDir => $ce->{webworkDirs}->{equationCache},
00056         cacheURL => $ce->{webworkURLs}->{equationCache},
00057         cacheDB  => $ce->{webworkFiles}->{equationCacheDB},
00058     );
00059     
00060     my $equationStr = $r->param('eq');
00061     $self->{equationStr} = $equationStr if defined $equationStr;
00062     $self->{typesetStr}  = $self->display_equation($equationStr) if $equationStr;
00063 }
00064

00081 
00082 sub body {
00083     my ($self) = @_;
00084     my $r = $self->r;
00085     
00086     #######################################
00087     # Initial data for the textarea field where the equation is entered
00088     #######################################
00089     my $initial_str = "Enter equation here";
00090     $initial_str = $r->param('eq') if $self->{equationStr};
00091     
00092     #######################################
00093     # Prepare to display the typeset image and
00094     # the HTML code that links to the source image.
00095     # The HTML code is linked also to the image address
00096     # This requires digging out the link from the string returned
00097     # by display_equation and ImageGenerator.
00098     # The server name and port are included in the new url.
00099     #######################################
00100     my $typesetStr = (defined $self->{typesetStr})?$self->{typesetStr}:'';
00101     
00102     #### add the host name to the string
00103     my $hostName = $r->hostname;
00104     my $port     = $r->get_server_port;
00105     $hostName    .= ":$port";
00106     $typesetStr =~ s|src="|src="http://$hostName|;
00107     
00108     my $typeset2Str = $typesetStr;
00109     $typeset2Str =~ s/</&lt;/g;
00110     $typeset2Str =~ s/>/&gt;/g;
00111     
00112     my $sourceHref = $typesetStr;
00113     $sourceHref =~ /"([^"]*)"/;
00114     $sourceHref = $1;
00115     
00116     #######################################
00117     # Print the page
00118     #######################################
00119     return join( "",
00120         "Copy the location of this image (or drag and drop) into your editing area:",
00121         CGI::br(),
00122         $typeset2Str,
00123         CGI::br(),
00124         $typesetStr,
00125         CGI::start_form(-method=>'POST', -action=>$r->uri),
00126         $self->hidden_authen_fields,
00127         CGI::textarea( "eq", $initial_str, 5, 40),
00128         CGI::submit('typeset', 'typeset'),
00129         CGI::end_form(),
00130     );
00131 }
